column4: ive just installed lubuntu on my laptop but i cant listen sounds how do i fix it?
open "alsamixer" in a terminal make sure nothing has MM under it
did you check for "MM" anywhere ?
how are you expecting to hear sound? analog pc speakers or???
in a terminal type sudo apt-get install pavucontrol
ok open it with typing pavucontrol in terminal. on configuration tab what does it say? and also make sure all your settings in there are correct.
thats not good! try pulseaudio -k in terminal and try again
ive just installed pulseaudio :P
what should i do now
look on the config tab? wat does it say? stereo analog duplex or something ?
E: [pulseaudio] main.c: Failed to kill daemon: No such process
uhhh.
sudo apt-get install pulseaudio ?
pastebin for me plz. aplay -L
if you run aplay /usr/share/sounds/alsa/Front_Center.wav in terminal do you hear the sound ?
you are a genius i hear sounds now
how do i add volume icon on lubuntu to taskbar
maybe right click and hit add items to panel or something to show a list? sorry don't use lubuntu
i open an mp3 and sounds bad :(
doesn't play at all or sounds bad ?
does everything sound like that?
i opened other mp3 and doesnt sound bad
